title: Galio W + Quick Cast
body: I noticed that when I press W it'll cast immediately to the 2nd one where it taunts enemies. (because i never walked forward slowly). Should this be fixed or is this made how it is.

replies.body: For channel abilities like galios W, you need to hold it down and release it when you want the second phase of the W to kick in...
^^^ He's right, just like Xerath's Q
